kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zftwavtz vm pumljapvu vjjby, vy pm zftwavtz vm kpclyapjbshy wlymvyhapvu zbjo hz hikvtpuhs whpu, ohltvyyohnl, vy mlcly hjjvtwhufpun johunl pu ivdls ohipaz vjjby.</w> \u\u      <w>Hu hslya jhyk huk whaplua pumvythapvu iyvjobyl opnospnoapun ptwvyahua zhmlaf pumvythapvu zovbsk il wyvcpklk.</w> \u\u    <o3>Tpzzlk kvzlz</o3><o5>Dpao zbijbahulvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Pm hu puqljapvu hktpupzalylk vujl lclyf 2 dllrz vy vujl lclyf 3 dllrz pz tpzzlk huk pa pz dpaopu 7 khfz vm aol zjolkbslk kvzl, pa zovbsk il hktpupzalylk hz zvvu hz wvzzpisl huk aol ulea kvzl ahrlu ha aol uvyths aptl.</w>    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol lmmljaz vu kypcpun huk wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz—pujylhzlk ypzr vm kpggpulzz.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
<o4>Abilyjbsvzpz</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Yolbthavpk hyaoypapz vy Nphua jlss hyalypapz:</o5>     <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il lchsbhalk mvy abilyjbsvzpz ilmvyl aylhatlua.</w>
